content.question: You will hear a series of brief conversations between two speakers. Each exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices printed, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Non, nous quittons Paris demain matin.
Bien sûr, Monsieur, cette place est en plein Paris.

content.answer: Non, nous quittons Paris demain matin.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
